      • validateScope

        public boolean validateScope(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
                      throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Description copied from class: OAuth2ScopeHandler
        Method to validate the scopes associated with the access token against the resource that is being accessed.
        Specified by:
        validateScope in class OAuth2ScopeHandler
        Parameters:
        tokReqMsgCtx - message context of the token request.
        Returns:
        true if scope is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if error occurs while scope validation.
